about_the_game:
The first full chapter of CatSacks is here!


You will receive all four full chapters of hidden object and find-the-differences puzzles for this one price through this year - no extra DLC costs!

Thank you so much for supporting this old lady's FIRST real game; it will fund future fun and all the wonderful people who helped make this a reality!

Check out the new video trailer by GeekEKitten to celebrate the game’s official release & ask all of your pawsome Padawan pals to wishlist 😻

Many thanks in advance for wishlisting...

...and please don't hesitate to reach out with feedback - your input is valuable! I appreciate you taking the time to 'paws' here for a quick miao!



It's the annual Catawauloo scout camping trip at Farmer Calico's farm! The cat scouts are excited to earn new badges and play their favorite games - especially the big sack race!

Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats and other floofy animals in four catastical worlds.

Locate all the cats to give them their race sacks before a big autumn storm rolls in...and some unexpected guests drop by.

I can't believe this is real!


I am so excited - let’s be honest, a little terrified! Building a game is no joke and I'm so lucky to have found amazing people to help me learn what I needed along the way.

This first game is a kitty-themed homage to the Where's Waldo (Wally) books, "Find the Differences" challenges in kid's magazines at the dentist in the 80's,
point & click adventures of the 90's, and flash games of the early 2000's, all of which shaped me as a gamer.

And what better way could there be to learn C# and Unity than to make a silly game about all the adorable floofs I know and love?

What will the future include?

  • 😻 Colorful worlds with multiple levels to search & explore
  • 😻 A menagerie of fuzzy friends & out of this world visitors
  • 😻 Real life kitty voice actors, original music & twists on old favorites
  • 😻 Secrets to find & puzzles to uncover
  • 😻 Easter eggs, easter eggs, and more easter eggs

The first full chapter of CatSacks is here!


You will receive all four full chapters of hidden object and find-the-differences puzzles for this one price through this year - no extra DLC costs!

Thank you so much for supporting this old lady's FIRST real game; it will fund future fun and all the wonderful people who helped make this a reality!

Check out the new video trailer by GeekEKitten to celebrate the game’s official release & ask all of your pawsome Padawan pals to wishlist 😻

movies.name: Meow The 4th Be With You CatSacks

name: CatSacks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Up
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel, AMD, Nvidia
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Up
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel, AMD, Nvidia

short_description: CatSacks is a cozy hidden object game of fuzzy friends with a little twist of puzzle solving fun. Click, slide, & spin objects to find hidden cats & other animals in four catastical worlds. Cat "finds" lovingly voiced by my real life kitties & friend's floofs!
